scripts.test-2.3: npm i debug@2.3 && npm run test
scripts.test-2.4: npm i debug@2.4 && npm run test
scripts.test-2.5: npm i debug@2.5 && npm run test
scripts.test-2.6: npm i debug@2.6 && npm run test
scripts.test-3.1: npm i debug@3.1 && npm run test
scripts.test-4.1: npm i debug@4.1 && npm run test
scripts.test:cov: standard && npm run deps && cross-env NODE_ENV=test tap --cov test/*.js
scripts.test:cov:html: standard && npm run deps && cross-env NODE_ENV=test tap --coverage-report=html test
